TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BufferedReceiveServiceBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior

Docs.summary: A service behavior that enables your service to use buffered receive processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The buffered receive feature enables a workflow service to process out-of-order messages. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Out-of-Order Message Processing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of pending messages allowed for each channel.
Docs.value: The maximum number of pending messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value is 512. This property limits the number of out-of-order messages that can be received by a workflow service.
